HDG.BC.content: [re: clinging to beings, equating dealing w/ the actual] acting (Handeln)/effecting (Wirken) bring to experience what the actual (Wirkliche) is [?], accompanied by freedom, participation in law of age > acc. Heidegger, Nietzsche’s freedom [“for what is freedom? that one has the will to self-responsibility”] conceives being a self as will to power, freedom as will to fulfill “will to power” (Nietzsche thinks like/unlike Kant): participation in actuality of actual

Heidegger, Nietzsche’s freedom [“for what is freedom? that one has the will to self-responsibility”] conceives being a self as will to power, freedom as will to fulfill “will to power” (Nietzsche thinks like/unlike Kant): participation in actuality of actual

HDG.EC.content: can only think older definition man, mortal, by way of the younger, thinker, so that only common interpretation of zōon logon echon is shallow > we can think logos originally as gathering, human is thus in the gathering toward the originally all-unifying One (auf das urspünglich alles einigende Eine) > in this thought of logos thinking and mortality think the self same (im Grunde das Selbe) > older, like everything inceptual (Anfängliche), harder (schwerer) to think [finitude as thnētos]

HDG.OHF.content: possible misunderstandings of the today: 1) most interesting tendencies of today [culture] 2) vacantly brooding over isolated ego-like self [self-world]
